name: Custom Stock Balance Report
query:
SELECT 
    bin.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    item.item_name AS "Item Name::200",
    item.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:150",
    bin.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
    bin.valuation_rate AS "Stock Value:Currency:120",
    bin.actual_qty AS "Boxes:Float:100",
    IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_weight) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn 
        WHERE sn.item_code = bin.item_code
    ), 0) AS "Weights:Float:120",   -- ✅ Added missing comma
    IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(sn.custom_length) 
        FROM `tabSerial No` sn 
        WHERE sn.item_code = bin.item_code  -- ❌ Incorrect reference to `sle.item_code`, changed to `bin.item_code`
    ), 0) AS "Total Meters:Float:120"
FROM `tabBin` bin
JOIN `tabItem` item ON bin.item_code = item.item_code
WHERE item.item_group = 'Products'
ORDER BY bin.item_code, bin.warehouse;
